description: A first look at New York City’s most luxurious available real estate, including condominiums, co-ops, lofts, townhouses, and brownstones.
title: Exclusive
maintext:
The Artist Emily Mason’s Sunny Flatiron Studio Is for Sale
The family of the abstract painter is selling her loft on West 20th Street, where she worked in the winter months. It is listed for $4.6 million.
